titles.title: A bill to provide for debt limit extensions.
A bill to provide for debt limit extensions.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 560.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Authorizes an increase in the public debt limit by an Executive order of the President.
(Currently, a public debt increase is limited to the congressional budget process, a presidential modification of the debt ceiling procedures subject to a joint resolution of disapproval, or otherwise.)
